title: Himi 207
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Ko e ‘Eiki Tauhi
Ko Sīsū Kalaisi,
Na’a ne lava’i
Ma’a ‘ene kakai
‘A e ma’a foaki ni,
Pea ‘oku tuku ki ai.
2.
Pea tafe hifo,
Ki he kakai tui,
‘A e lolo tapu,
Pea tafe ma’u pē,
‘O a’u ki he si’i hifo,
‘Oku tui ki he Lami.
3.
‘Io ki he tapa,
‘O hono fu’u kofu.
Ko e kau feinga,
‘Oku fie ‘ofa
Ki he Lami toto’ia,
‘Oku anga’ofa ia.
4.
‘Oku tau ongo’i
‘Ene fakafo’ou,
‘A hotau tokoni,
‘O hokohoko fai
‘Oku pongipongi hake,
Pea efiafi foki.
5.
Ko e hahau lelei,
Fakaakeake;
‘Oku ngangana mai,
Ki hotau Saione,
‘Oku tokonaki ia,
Ma’a e kakai kotoa pē.
6.
’Oku lilingi ni,
‘E hotau ‘Otua,
‘A e tapuaki,
Mei ‘olunga na;
Ko e ‘uha fakatupu,
‘A e ‘ofa, ‘i he loto. *
